duplicates.removed_title: Alexa+ comes for ChatGPT's web turf
duplicates.duplicate_of_title: Amazon’s AI assistant comes to the web with Alexa.com
duplicates.reason: Both articles cover the same specific event: Amazon's launch of Alexa.com and the Alexa+ web-based AI assistant. They report on the same product announcement with overlapping details about partnerships (Expedia, Yelp, Square) and the platform's capabilities. The articles are from different sources (Rundown vs TechCrunch) covering the same news event on consecutive dates.

duplicates.removed_title: NEWS: Nvidia has released a new video of its next-generation Rubin chips, which are 5X more powerful...
duplicates.duplicate_of_title: Nvidia launches powerful new Rubin chip architecture
duplicates.reason: Both articles cover Nvidia's announcement of its next-generation Rubin chips. They report the same specific product launch with consistent details (5x more powerful than Blackwell, production underway, pod configuration with GPUs). Despite minor variations in framing (one mentions CES 2026 venue, the other emphasizes CEO demonstration), they are reporting the same announcement from different sources on the same date.
